name: oh-no-the-css-stapler-was-cake-css-cake-
title: Oh no! The CSS stapler was cake! (CSS cake)
description:
Illustration of a stapler coded in HTML and CSS using a single element. Some fun facts:

- It is interactive: the stapler opens and closes on click because the element is a checkbox (...although I wouldn't recommend using it in a form üòÖ)
- It is responsive: just change the width (it uses `aspect-ratio` to adapt).
- It is not cake... it's CSS!

Based on this [stapler on Amazon](https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/61ED7jQCO-L._AC_SX679_.jpg)
